definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:missions</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:missions</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Pergamino</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:missions</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tell @p ¡Las misiones han sido reclamadas!</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tell @p ¡Todavía no tienes una misión, te toca esperar!</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
